Comments_List: Crucial guidance through my two opera roles in the Spring and continued vocal training

Lots. Wendy and I worked more on my technique this semester, and thanks to her coaching, I feel like I reached a few breakthroughs during the semester! My bowhold and posture in particular are improving.
